page.title: 15NETHERTON NY0435 + NY0436
page.content: This is close to the town centre.The streets are set out in a grid iron pattern.It cosists of 222 late Victorian terraced houses,most built for mine workers.They are made of rendered brickwork or dressed red sandstone.There are no front gardens and the houses have backyards and back lanes.There are no open spaces.The amenities are,2 churches,1 infant school,1 community hall,1 public house with bowling green,newsagents and a fish and chipshop,3 grocers,1 post office and 1 hair dressers. NETHERTON ESTATE NY0436 This consists of 20 bungalows,292 semi-detached and 70 terraced houses,built by the North Housing Association.They rendered brickwork and have medium sized gardens to front and back.Amenities include infant school and some open space.
